2020 Covid-19 Timeline

Introductory paragraphs giving broad overview of the timeline.

First wave particularly bad.

  • 29/01/2020: Covid19 genome sequenced by the French non-profit organisation Institut Pasteur.
  • 31/01/2020: First two confirmed cases in the UK found in guests at a hotel in York.
  • 05/03/2020: First official UK death due to Covid-19.
  • 23/03/2020: Lockdown announced.
